title: The Passion of the Christ (soundtrack)
text:
The Passion of the Christ is the <a href="soundtrack">soundtrack</a>, on the <a href="Sony">Sony</a> label, of the <a href="2004%20in%20film">2004</a> <a href="Academy%20Award">Academy Award</a>-nominated <a href="film">film</a> "<a href="The%20Passion%20of%20the%20Christ">The Passion of the Christ</a>" starring <a href="James%20Caviezel">James Caviezel</a>, <a href="Maia%20Morgenstern">Maia Morgenstern</a>, <a href="Christo%20Jivkov">Christo Jivkov</a>, Hristo Shopov, <a href="Francesco%20De%20Vito">Francesco De Vito</a> and <a href="Monica%20Bellucci">Monica Bellucci</a>. The original <a href="Film%20score">score</a> was composed by <a href="John%20Debney">John Debney</a>.
The album was nominated for the <a href="Academy%20Award%20for%20Best%20Original%20Score">Academy Award for Best Original Score</a>. <a href="Mel%20Gibson">Mel Gibson</a>, the director for <a href="The%20Passion%20of%20the%20Christ">The Passion of the Christ</a>, is believed to have sung in part of the soundtrack.
Awards.
On 2005, the album won a <a href="Dove%20Award">Dove Award</a> for Instrumental Album of the Year at the <a href="36th%20GMA%20Dove%20Awards">36th GMA Dove Awards</a>.
The album was also nominated for the <a href="Academy%20Award%20for%20Best%20Original%20Score">Academy Award for Best Original Score</a> at the <a href="77th%20Academy%20Awards">77th Academy Awards</a> (2004).
